material: high quality solid steel with chrome plated silver ends and black rubber/foam textured grip
usage: Strength training and fitness exercises such as arm workouts, dumbbell sidebends, planks and general muscle building at home or in the gym.

Foam covered handles provide additional grip while exercising
Ultra-compact size for more effective training
Solid high grade steel and innovative structure
Chrome coating gives a premium feel with anti-slip texture
Handles will not bend or break after repeated use
Ideal weights for beginners and professionals

ai_description: A sleek pair of KAKSS chrome-plated steel dumbbells with perfectly round silver ends and black textured rubber or foam grips. The compact design features clearly stamped weight markings and a polished finish, giving a premium, sturdy look suited to home or gym settings.
target_audience: Men and women, from beginners to professional fitness enthusiasts, looking for compact steel dumbbells for home or gym workouts.
